body: The budget of this task is **1 hour**. This is exactly how much time will be compensated when the task is completed.
@yegor256 this task is yours, please help (see our key [principles of work](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles))
@yegor256 we're waiting for your feedback, please keep us posted on your progress
@yegor256 stop where you are, the task is not yours any more
